notes.text: This advisory aggregates security fixes for the kernel SRPM in CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 8.8. It addresses 12 CVEs: CVE-2022-49803, CVE-2022-49921, CVE-2023-31436, CVE-2023-3609, CVE-2023-3611, and 7 more.
notes.title: Description

document.title: kernel security update for CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 8.8
